aasiyanu shurathawaliyata dedenek yathi | kelimandala aasiyanu shurathawaliyata dedenek yathi 2017-11-09 18:28:02 | susil premalal me masa 26 wanida chinaye don guwan nagaraye pawathwimata niyamitha 14 wani aasiyanu shuratha marathan tharagayata shri lankawen kridaka kridikawan dedenaku sahabhagi karawimata shri lanka malala krida sangamaya thiranaya kara atha. 2016 riyo olimpik krida uleledi shri lankawa niyojanaya kala githani rajasekara saha 2017 warshayedi 43 wani jathika krida ulele marathan shura pradip anurasinha aasiyanu marathan shurathawaliyata sahabhagi wethi.

jathyanthara welendapole pohora mila wadi wima hethuwen pohora ki.ga්ra. 50 ka mitiyak rupiyal 350 tama gowinta labadima sandaha ayawayen wen kala mudalata aasanna mudalak warshaye palamu pas masa thula wiyadam wi athi athara pasugiya da parlimenthuwedi paripuraka asthamenthuwak mangin pohora sahanadharaya sandaha rupiyal miliyana 11000 ka amathara mudalak wen karana ladi.2004 di pohora sandaha 80% k sahanadharayak labadena ladi.
